attributes.action: To maintain Royal Mail as a public service and stop any moves for phantom shares and give full committment to providing Royal Mail with a fair playing field in which to compete against ever increasing competition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Royal Mail is a public service and should remain so, any talk of shares, phanton shares and the like must be stopped and a move to improving pay and conditions fully addressed. Royal Mail can never compete against any competition as it stands at the moment. Changes need to be made for all competitors so that all works carried out are the same and all have to adhere to the same rules and regulations.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
